column4: Hey all, anyone know the best web text editor? Looking for something similar to notepad++?
vim
VIM?
not gvim, just vim
what should i search in the software center?
jsut vim?
a version of vim is preinstalled with the os, but it's the "tiny" version
hmm alright since there all similar, any with a nice user interface?
I like macish interfaces
lol
i dunno if that makes sense but lol
vim is maybe too complicated for you then
hmm ok ill check it out
thanks step21
nano? i searched "nano" in the software center and nothing
do you know where I can find "nano"?
it is installed by default
where would i find it if its installed? i looked through applications and cant find it
!enter | jamesbrink
just type "nano" in a terminal
lol step21 was that a joke?
I asked for one with an interface and nano runs in terminal? lol
you don't need anything more than that for text editing
